item.title: How do i make this command work
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

[quote="~ownage~, post:2, topic:83274"]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("carpet") && playerRights >= 1) { setAnimation(2261); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 2261; playerSER = 2261; playerSEA = 2261; playerEnergy = 2147000000; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"Energy...", 149); sendMessage("Magic Carpet ON"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("carpetoff") && playerRights >= 1){ sendMessage("Magic Carpet OFF"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"Energy..", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Add it in commands.java and add it under the last “}”.[/quote]pointless m8 u didnt even edit the command and i dont have commands.java no point i add my stuff in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make this command work
item.dc:creator: @_ownage1 ~ownage~
item.description:
@_ownage1 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("carpet") && playerRights >= 1) { setAnimation(2261); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 2261; playerSER = 2261; playerSEA = 2261; playerEnergy = 2147000000; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"Energy...", 149); sendMessage("Magic Carpet ON"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("carpetoff") && playerRights >= 1){ sendMessage("Magic Carpet OFF"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"Energy..", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Add it in commands.java and add it under the last “}”.

item.title: How do i make this command work
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

this command wont work wat i mean by that is i type ::carpet and i go up on the air on the flying carpet and i want to be able to fly around on the carpet like the command ::god or ::fly that comand makes u fly around everywhere like superman i want to be able to fly around everywhere on a magic carpet but it wont move around anywhere and when i type ::carpetoff im still on the magic carpet it doesnt make me normal again some1 plz help here is the command i made

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("carpet") && playerRights >= 1) { setAnimation(2261); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 2261; playerSER = 2261; playerSEA = 2261; playerEnergy = 2147000000; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"Energy...", 149); sendMessage("Magic Carpet ON"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("carpetoff") && playerRights >= 1){ sendMessage("Magic Carpet OFF"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"Energy..", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
